name: Lando Calrissian (V)
Lore: 'Former owner of the Millennium Falcon. Despite a notorious past, has become a successful chief administrator of a Tibanna gas mining facility. Scoundrel and Gambler.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots (3 if piloting Falcon). May convert opponent''s Lando present at a site. While with Leia, Lando is Heroic. During battle, may use 1 Force to cancel the game text of opponent''s character of ability < 5 (or with a [Permanent Weapon]) at same site.(Original concept by Tim Simon - PA States 2006)',
